code: import React from'react';import{LoginPage}from'./pages/LoginPage';import{UnifiedDashboard}from'./pages/UnifiedDashboard';import{useAuthStore}from'./store/auth.store';import'./styles/ultra-premium.css';import'./styles/global.css';import'./styles/application-detail.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){console.info('üì± App component mounted');const{isAuthenticated,login,logout}=useAuthStore();console.info('üîê Auth status:',isAuthenticated?'Authenticated':'Not authenticated');const handleLogin=async(username,password)=>{console.info('üîë Login attempt for user:',username);try{const success=await login(username,password);if(!success){console.error('‚ùå Login failed: Invalid credentials');throw new Error('Invalid credentials');}console.info('‚úÖ Login successful');}catch(error){console.error('‚ùå Login error:',error);throw error;}};if(!isAuthenticated){console.info('üîì Rendering login page');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginPage,{onLogin:handleLogin});}console.info('üè† Rendering dashboard');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UnifiedDashboard,{onLogout:logout})});}export default App;
